Description: Fragment of oval handle to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Marsyas. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0685.07.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (179)
